definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
(once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
exterior appearance/to view sth from the outside/exterior condition
to wait and see/to watch from the sidelines/to look around/to survey

sentences.english: Ancient Chinese literary theory is living, and its structure is organic.
sentences.chinese: 中国古代文论是生命性文论，是一种整体有机结构观。

sentences.english: It should also be admitted that his views are obviously narrow and limited.
sentences.chinese: 其诗学观的褊狭也是显而易见的。

sentences.english: My ideal match is a woman with a good sense of family.
sentences.chinese: 我的理想对象是要有好的家庭观。

sentences.english: The science view is changing, forming technoscience view.
sentences.chinese: 它是科学观的一次转向，形成了技性科学观。

sentences.english: The science view is changing, forming technoscience view.
sentences.chinese: 它是科学观的一次转向，形成了技性科学观。

sentences.english: The second chapter mainly discusses Dingli's commercial literary view.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分主要论述了丁力的商情文学观。

sentences.english: Can We Rely on Non-Christian Views of Justice?
sentences.chinese: 我们能依靠非基督教观的法官？

sentences.english: Holy Spirit and Eschatology in Paul.
sentences.chinese: 保罗思想中的圣灵观与末世论。

sentences.english: The second chapter questioned the ancient Greek's thoughts about heroes and women.
sentences.chinese: 第二章侧重于对古希腊人英雄观与女性观的质疑。

sentences.english: The second chapter questioned the ancient Greek's thoughts about heroes and women.
sentences.chinese: 第二章侧重于对古希腊人英雄观与女性观的质疑。

sentences.english: Practice-creation is the essence of Marx's freedom-living idea.
sentences.chinese: 实践创生性是马克思自由生存观的本质。

sentences.english: Today I want to visit Changchun Taoist Temple and Guiyuan Temple.
sentences.chinese: 今天我想参观长春观和归元寺。

sentences.english: The third part is about the main content of Mencius Ethnological Viewpoint.
sentences.chinese: 第三章孟子民族观主要内容。

sentences.english: This thesis is to analyze his theory of journalism occupation from the before-mentioned aspects.
sentences.chinese: 本文将围绕以上这几个方面来讨论他的新闻职业观。

sentences.english: We summed these results into new viewpoints of the regional economics.
sentences.chinese: 我们将这些研究成果概括为新区域经济观。

sentences.english: Reciprocal teaching is a model of inactive learning's application in reading comprehension.
sentences.chinese: 交互教学就是元认知缺陷观应用于阅读教学的典范。

definition: oneness of heaven and humanity/the theory that man is an integral part of nature
to sense/perception/to feel (through the senses)/to experience/a feeling/an impression/an experience
